DataElement.preferredName: Maternal Grandfather Birth Place Arkansas Geographic Area Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Region of Arkansas where the Maternal grand-father was born.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The geographical location where the Maternal grand-father was born. [Manually curated]

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person related by lineage through the mother's side of the family.:The father of your father or mother.

Concepts.definition: A person related by lineage through the mother's side of the family.
The father of your father or mother.

Property.preferredDefinition: Geographic; of or relating to the science of geography; determined by geography.:The event of being born.:Place; the particular portion of space occupied by a physical object.

Concepts.definition: Of or relating to the science of geography; determined by geography.
The event of being born.
The particular portion of space occupied by a physical object or intended for a physical object.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A state in the southern midwest United States. Its capital is Little Rock._All of the continents and every country situated within, the UNITED STATES and each of the constituent states arranged by region, CANADA and each of its provinces, AUSTRALIA and each of its states, the major bodies of water and major islands on both hemispheres, and selected major cities. Although the geographic locations are not printed in INDEX MEDICUS as main headings, in indexing they are significant in epidemiologic studies and historical articles and for locating administrative units in education and the delivery of health care._Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A state in the southern midwest United States. Its capital is Little Rock.: All of the continents and every country situated within, the UNITED STATES and each of the constituent states arranged by region, CANADA and each of its provinces, AUSTRALIA and each of its states, the major bodies of water and major islands on both hemispheres, and selected major cities. Although the geographic locations are not printed in INDEX MEDICUS as main headings, in indexing they are significant in epidemiologic studies and historical articles and for locating administrative units in education and the delivery of health care.

Concepts.definition: A state in the southern midwest United States. Its capital is Little Rock.
Any demarcated area of the Earth; may be determined by both natural and human boundaries.
